data.question: Cup is to coffee as bowl is to..
data.explain: Coffee goes into a cup and soup goes into a bowl.

data.question: Exercise is to gym as eating is to..
data.explain: A gym is a place where people exercise.A restaurant is a place where people eat.

data.question: Oar is to rowboat as foot is to..
data.explain: An oar puts a rowboat into motion. A foot puts a skateboard into motion.

data.question: Window is to pane as book is to..
data.explain: A window is made up of panes, and a book is made up of pages.

data.question: Secretly is to openly as silently is to..
data.explain: Secretly is the opposite of openly, and silently is the opposite of noisily.

data.question: Artist is to painting as senator is to..
data.explain: An artist makes paintings; a senator makes laws.

data.question: Play is to actor as concert is to..
data.explain: An actor performs in a play. A musician performs at a concert.

data.question: Careful is to cautious as boastful is to..
data.explain: Careful and cautious are synonyms (they mean the same thing). Boastful and arrogant are also synonyms.

data.question: Pride is to lion as school is to..
data.explain: A group of lions is called a pride. A group of fish swim in a school.

data.question: Guide is to direct as reduce is to..
data.explain: Guide and direct are synonyms, and reduce and decrease are synonyms.

data.question: Yard is to inch as quart is to..
data.explain: A yard is a larger measure than an inch (a yard contains 36 inches). A quart is a larger measure than an ounce (a quart contains 32 ounces).

data.question: Reptile is to lizard as flower is to..
data.explain: A lizard is a type of reptile; a daisy is a type of flower.

data.question: Elated is to despondent as enlightened is to..
data.explain: Elated is the opposite of despondent; enlightened is the opposite of ignorant.

data.question: Marathon is to race as hibernation is to..
data.explain: A marathon is a long race and hibernation is a lengthy period of sleep.

data.question: Embarrassed is to humiliated as frightened is to..
data.explain: If someone has been humiliated, they have been greatly embarrassed.If someone is terrified, they are extremely frightened.

data.question: Odometer is to mileage as compass is to..
data.explain: An odometer is an instrument used to measure mileage. A compass is an instrument used to determine direction.

data.question: Optimist is to cheerful as pessimist is to..
data.explain: An optimist is a person whose outlook is cheerful. A pessimist is a person whose outlook is gloomy.

data.question: Sponge is to porous as rubber is to..
data.explain: A sponge is a porous material. Rubber is an elastic material.

data.question: Candid is to indirect as honest is to..
data.explain: Candid and indirect refer to opposing traits. Honest and untruthful refer to opposing traits.

data.question: Pen is to poet as needle is to..
data.explain: A pen is a tool used by a poet. A needle is a tool used by a tailor.
